repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:sid 

MAINTAINER Andr√© R. de Miranda <ardemiranda@gmail.com> 

COPY ices2.sh / 

RUN apt-get update \
&& apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y ices2 \
&& apt-get clean \
&& rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* \
&& chmod a+rx /ices2.sh

# uses config file /adata/ices2.xml and /adata/audio-fifo 
CMD [ "/ices2.sh" ]
